Engine: Unity
Development time: 48 hours
Team: 3 ninjas

A game developed during Slavic Game Jam with a team of people met on the spot: Magdalena Bliźniak and Bartek Szczygło. I was the lead programmer and also created one music piece(0:11 in the clip above). The game is also available on Android.
